game.name: MoonLost
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 색상 대체, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An old-style shooter with adventure mechanics and a nostalgic environment, ready to make you feel stimulated for fighting strange creatures and comfortable while exploring a fantasy reality. You'll deal with shooting ostile creatures, meditating and find meaning of ancient books to manage stats.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An old-style shooter with adventure mechanics and a nostalgic environment, ready to make you feel stimulated for fighting strange creatures and comfortable while exploring a fantasy reality. You'll deal with shooting ostile creatures, meditating and find meaning of ancient books to manage stats.
